author: bdalek1
title: Episode 16: Running Clean
text:
Privacy Policy | About Us 
For starters, he hadn’t run a qualifying race. In fact he’d never run any formal race ever. Then there was the issue of gear. He didn’t own a pair of running shoes or running shorts. And he only had 10 days to solve all these problems. Also he was in jail. 
This episode of Human Race explores Keith’s journey from several years in prison to finding a passion to running 26.2 miles. Keith Giroux on the treadmill. Andy Castillo Giroux, in the cell where he spent five years. Andy Castillo Further reading:
